cause.description:
Amigos de las Américas (AMIGOS) is a non-profit organization, established in 1965, which empowers teenagers and young adults to develop leadership skills and increase multi-cultural awareness through training and community service in Latin America.
Our mission is to: build partnerships to empower young leaders; advance community development; and strengthen multicultural understanding in the Americas.
This cause page was started by an AMIGOS alumni. For more information check out www.amigoslink.org
